text: I am a versatile software developer with expertise in various programming languages including C, C++, C#, Golang, Rust, Java, Kotlin, and Javascript. My skills also extend to database management, with experience in SQL, MongoDB, DynamoDB, NoSQL, Redis, and REST APIs. I am well-versed in using popular frameworks such as NextJS, React, and Bootstrap to create dynamic and responsive web applications. Additionally, I have experience working with AWS, Git, Github, and Docker to deploy and maintain applications on the cloud.
